itunes:title: INTRO // let the gains begin
title: INTRO // let the gains begin
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
itunes:summary:
Brittany is excited to join you in a whole new way. Tune in to hear about her plans for this podcast and welcome to the fun and gains fam.

05:40 vulnerability

06:10 subscribe!
